name: Data Impact
body:
### Welcome to Data Impact
####Whats it like being a data scientist? 
Having been offically a data scientist for 6 months - I have learnt a hell of alot in a very short period of time but I still have alot to learn. I expect that I will never stop learning on the job but its fun and full of  suprises and challenges that would make most people nauseous. 

####What does it take to be a data scientist?
You have to be curious, hardworking, flexible and above all willing to learn, listen and play with data until you want to throw your computer out the window. 

### Whats on here
I am planning to share my useful pieces of code that makes my life alot easier that might be helpful to you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
